The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 06 August is 58,827 (6,780.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 01 August, there were 2,208 new confirmed cases (254.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 July, there were 2,646 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 17% (438 fewer cases).
